TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RetryPolicy extends Azure.Core.Pipeline.HttpPipelinePolicy

Docs.summary: Represents a policy that can be overriden to customize whether or not a request will be retried and how long to wait before retrying.

MemberSignature.Value: public RetryPolicy (int maxRetries = 3, Azure.Core.DelayStrategy? delayStrategy = default);

Docs.param: The maximum number of retries to attempt.
The delay to use for computing the interval between retry attempts.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnRequestSent (Azure.Core.HttpMessage message);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRequestSent(class Azure.Core.HttpMessage message) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnRequestSent (message As HttpMessage)
abstract member OnRequestSent : Azure.Core.HttpMessage -> unit override this.OnRequestSent : Azure.Core.HttpMessage -> unit

Docs.param: The message containing the request and response.
Docs.summary: This method can be overridden to introduce logic that runs after the request is sent through the pipeline and control is returned to the retry policy. This method will only be called for sync methods.

Docs.param: The message containing the request and response.

Docs.param: The this policy would be applied to.
The set of to execute after current one.
Docs.summary: This method can be overriden to take full control over the retry policy. If this is overriden and the base method isn't called, it is the implementer's responsibility to populate the property. This method will only be called for sync methods.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool ShouldRetry (Azure.Core.HttpMessage message, Exception? exception);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldRetry(class Azure.Core.HttpMessage message, class System.Exception exception) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function ShouldRetry (message As HttpMessage, exception As Exception) As Boolean
abstract member ShouldRetry : Azure.Core.HttpMessage * Exception -> bool override this.ShouldRetry : Azure.Core.HttpMessage * Exception -> bool

Docs.param: The message containing the request and response.
The exception that occurred, if any, which can be used to determine if a retry should occur.
Docs.summary: This method can be overriden to control whether a request should be retried. It will be called for any response where is true, or if an exception is thrown from any subsequent pipeline policies or the transport. This method will only be called for sync methods.

The exception that occurred, if any, which can be used to determine if a retry should occur.
Docs.summary: This method can be overriden to control whether a request should be retried. It will be called for any response where is true, or if an exception is thrown from any subsequent pipeline policies or the transport. This method will only be called for async methods.
